ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How much do you think people risk harming themselves (physically or in other ways) if they use cigarettes every day?
Notes: 1= No risk; 2= Slight risk; 3=  Moderate risk; 4= Great risk;9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How much do you think people risk harming themselves (physically or in other ways) if they use electronic vapor products every day?
Notes: 1= No risk; 2= Slight risk; 3=  Moderate risk; 4= Great risk;9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How wrong do you think it is for someone your age to use electronic vapor products?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How wrong would most adults (over 21) in your neighborhood think it is for kids to use electronic vapor products?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How wrong do your parents or guardians feel it would be for you to use electronic vapor products?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How much do you think people risk harming themselves (physically or in other ways) if they drink alcohol sometimes?
Notes: 1= No risk; 2= Slight risk; 3=  Moderate risk; 4= Great risk; 9= Refuse

ElementDescription: How wrong do you think it is for someone your age to drink alcohol sometimes?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How wrong would most adults in your neighborhood think it is for kids (younger than 21 years old) to drink alcohol?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How wrong do your parents or guardians feel it would be for you to drink alcohol?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How much do you think people risk harming themselves (physically or in other ways) if they use marijuana?
Notes: 1= No risk; 2= Slight risk; 3=  Moderate risk; 4= Great risk; 9= Refuse

ElementDescription: How wrong do you think it is for someone your age to use marijuana?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How wrong would most adults (over 21) in your neighborhood think it is for kids younger than 21 years old to use marijuana?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How wrong do your parents or guardians feel it would be for you to use marijuana?
Notes: 1= Very wrong; 2=Wrong; 3= A little wrong; 4= Not wrong; 9= Refuse to answer
